Chipotle - HSA $1500 Medical Plan SBC.Sean_Fajardo: Per your in-network benefits, mental health office visits and other outpatient services are subject to either the $1,500 individual deductible if on an employee only plan or the $3,000 family deductible if multiple people are on the plan. Once the respective deductible is satisfied, then services are covered at 80% until either the $4,000 individual out-of-pocket maximum or the $7,150 family out-of-pocket maximum is met. Per your out-of-network benefits, mental health office visits and other outpatient services are subject towards either the $3,000 individual out-of-network deductible if on an employee only plan or the $6,000 family out-of-network deductible if multiple people are on the plan. Once the respective deductible is satisfied, then services are covered at 50% until either the $12,000 individual out-of-network out-of-pocket maximum or the $24,000 family out-of-network out-of-pocket maximum is met.

|What is the overall deductible?|$0|See the Common Medical Events chart below for your costs for services this plan covers.|
|Are there services covered before you meet your deductible?|Not Applicable.|This plan covers some items and services even if you haven't yet met the deductible amount. But a copayment or coinsurance may apply.|
|Are there other deductibles for specific services?|No.|You don't have to meet deductibles for specific services.|
|What is the out-of-pocket limit for this plan?|$1,500 Individual / $3,000 Family|The out-of-pocket limit is the most you could pay in a year for covered services. If you have other family members in this plan, they have to meet their own out-of- pocket limits until the overall family out-of-pocket limit has been met.|
|What is not included in the out-of-pocket limit?|Premiums, health care this plan doesn't cover, and services indicated in chart starting on page 2.|Even though you pay these expenses, they don't count toward the out-of-pocket limit.|
|Will you pay less if you use a network provider?|Yes. See www.kp.org or call 1-800-278-3296 (TTY: 711) for a list of network providers.|This plan uses a provider network. You will pay less if you use a provider in the plan's network. You will pay the most if you use an out-of-network provider, and you might receive a bill from a provider for the difference between the provider's charge and what your plan pays (balance billing). Be aware, your network provider might use an out-of-network provider for some services (such as lab work). Check with your provider before you get services.|
|Do you need a referral to see a specialist?|Yes, but you may self-refer to certain specialists.|This plan will pay some or all of the costs to see a specialist for covered services but only if you have a referral before you see the specialist.|

Chipotle - HSA $1500 Medical Plan SBC.Sean_Fajardo: Per your in-network benefits, physical therapy visits are subject towards either the $1,500 individual deductible if on an employee only plan or the $3,000 family deductible if multiple people are on the plan. Once the respective deductible is satisfied, then services are covered at 80% until either the $4,000 individual out-of-pocket maximum or the $7,150 family out-of-pocket maximum is met. Per your out-of-network benefits, physical therapy visits are subject towards either the $3,000 individual out-of-network deductible if on an employee only plan or the $6,000 family out-of-network deductible if multiple people are on the plan. Once the respective deductible is satisfied, then services are covered at 50% until either the $12,000 individual out-of-network out-of-pocket maximum or the $24,000 family out-of-network out-of-pocket maximum is met. Please note that there is a 60-visit limit for physical, speech, and occupational therapies combined per benefit period.

Chipotle - PPO $250 Medical Plan SBC.Sean_Fajardo: Per your in-network benefits, physical therapy visits are subject to the $250 individual in-network deductible, then covered at 80% until either the $2,250 individual in-network out-of-pocket maximum or the $4,500 family in-network out-of-pocket maximum is met. Per your out-of-network benefits, physical therapy visits are subject to the $500 individual in-network deductible, then covered at 50% until either the $4,500 individual out-of-network out-of-pocket maximum or the $9,000 family out-of-network out-of-pocket maximum is met. Please note that there is a 60-visit limit for physical, speech, and occupational therapies combined per benefit period.

Chipotle - HSA $1500 Medical Plan SBC.Sean_Fajardo: Per your in-network benefits, urgent care visits are subject towards either the $1,500 individual deductible if on an employee only plan or the $3,000 family deductible if multiple people are on the plan. Once the respective deductible is satisfied, then services are covered at 80% until either the $4,000 individual out-of-pocket maximum or the $7,150 family out-of-pocket maximum is met. Per your out-of-network benefits, urgent care visits are subject towards either the $3,000 individual out-of-network deductible if on an employee only plan or the $6,000 family out-of-network deductible if multiple people are on the plan. Once the respective deductible is satisfied, then services are covered at 50% until either the $12,000 individual out-of-network out-of-pocket maximum or the $24,000 family out-of-network out-of-pocket maximum is met.
